P

Player - Class in main
Class for Player data and associated objects.
Player(String, String, Command, Location) - Constructor for class main.Player
Create a new Player with the given name, and color, and create a new Turtle using the given Command object and starting Location object.
Player(String, String, Command) - Constructor for class main.Player
Create a new Player with the given name, and color, and create a new Turtle using the given Command object
PLAYER_COLORS - Variable in class main.PlayerList
Set up the default player colors, in Red, Green, Blue, Yellow
playerColor - Variable in class main.Player
The color associated with the player, in the form of a hex string, eg 0xFFFFFF
playerCreationScene(Stage) - Method in class main.ViewApplication
Update stage to the player creation screen.
playerCreationSceneGraph(Stage) - Method in class main.ViewApplication
Return a Pane object containing the scene graph for the player creation scene
playerLines - Variable in class main.Player
The List of Line objects controlled by the player
PlayerList - Class in main
Tracks methods for adding, removing, and accessing Player objects.
PlayerList() - Constructor for class main.PlayerList
Create a new, empty PlayerList, and set up the starting locations based on the set boardsize and stepsize.
playerList - Variable in class main.PlayerList
Track the Players in player
playerName - Variable in class main.Player
The name of the player
players - Variable in class main.GameController
The PlayerList object controlling all the players for the game.
PlayerTextFields(TextField, TextArea) - Constructor for class main.ViewApplication.PlayerTextFields
 
playerTurtle - Variable in class main.Player
The Turtle object of the player
playGameScene(Stage) - Method in class main.ViewApplication
Create the Scene graph for the game play and update the primaryStage with that graph
playGameSceneGraph(Stage) - Method in class main.ViewApplication
Create the Scene Graph for the actual game board screen, with players, commands, and turtle running.
